name: Energy Balls without Peanut Butter
author: Erena Wismer
summary: No peanut butter in these energy balls. Dates and brown rice syrup make these a sticky, gooey satisfaction.
directions: Burst oats into a coarse meal in the bowl of a food processor
Add pumpkin seeds, walnuts, and pecans; pulse 10 to 15 times, until chunks are desired size
Toss dates into the food processor and mix for 30 seconds
Pour rice syrup in slowly, with the processor running, until combined and starting to ball up
Transfer to a bowl and mix in chocolate chips, coconut, raisins, and sunflower seeds
Pull off dough in 25 gram sections and roll into balls
Place in a single layer on a cookie sheet; it's okay if they touch but make sure they are not stacked
Refrigerate for 2 to 24 hours before serving
